page.title: 13FOOTBALL HOOLIGANS IN 1985
page.content: I think football hooligans are stupid. When one team wins the losing teams supporters often get angry and start fights. The worst case was in Brussels in May 1985 when Liverpool played Juventus of Italy in the European Cup Final. 38 people died because of the rioting. The night before supporters of both teams shared a camp site and played cards together,getting on really well,but on the day there was trouble and a huge brick wall collapsed.Usually it is not as bad as that. Sometimes fans invade the pitch. There are quite a few policemen around in case of trouble. I am glad to say there is hardly any trouble at the City football ground in Coventry. I hope that in years to come the stupidity of hooliganism stops.
